languages.text: "В Прорве обосновался культ Губительной жажды. Им правят три Суккубы — Тазарра, Кикеросс и Синисториа. На арене чаще всего руководит Кикеросс, а Тазарра ходит в рейды за новыми бойцами. Но всем известно, что самая страшная и влиятельная среди них — Синисториа. Именно она заключила союз между культом и Опустошительной бурей, но в последнее время почему-то держится в тени".

"The Chasm is the turf of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst, which is led by three Succubi: Tazarra, Keykeross, and Sinisthoria. Keykeross is typically the one in charge of arena fights while Tazarra goes on raids to harvest new fighters. But it's no secret that Sinisthoria is the most fearsome and powerful of the three. She's the one who forged the alliance between the Cult and the Reaving Tempest... though for some reason, she has been avoiding the spotlight lately."
languages.original_text: "В Прорве обосновался культ Губительной жажды. Им правят три Суккубы — Тазарра, Кикеросс и Синисториа. На арене чаще всего руководит Кикеросс, а Тазарра ходит в рейды за новыми бойцами. Но всем известно, что самая страшная и влиятельная среди них — Синисториа. Именно она заключила союз между культом и Опустошительной бурей, но в последнее время почему-то держится в тени".

She's the one who forged the alliance between the Cult and the Reaving Tempest... though for some reason, she hasn't seen much spotlight lately."

languages.text: “裂隙是致命饥渴教派的地盘，这个教派的领袖是三位血腥魔女：塔扎菈、绮克萝丝、希斯索莉亚。通常而言，绮克萝丝负责竞技场中的战斗，塔扎菈负责袭击各个世界，掠夺新的战士。但毋庸置疑，希斯索莉亚才是这三位血腥魔女中最可怕、最强大的那位，是她促成了致命饥渴教派与狂风阴谋团之间的联盟……但出于某种原因，她最近一直都没有露面。”
languages.original_text: "The Chasm is the turf of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst, which is led by three Succubi: Tazarra, Keykeross, and Sinisthoria. Keykeross is typically the one in charge of arena fights while Tazarra goes on raids to harvest new fighters. But it's no secret that Sinisthoria is the most fearsome and powerful of the three. She's the one who forged the alliance between the Cult and the Reaving Tempest... though for some reason, she has been avoiding the spotlight lately."

traits.locale_text: “裂隙是致命饥渴教派的地盘，这个教派的领袖是三位血腥魔女：塔扎菈、绮克萝丝、希斯索莉亚。通常而言，绮克萝丝负责竞技场中的战斗，塔扎菈负责袭击各个世界，掠夺新的战士。但毋庸置疑，希斯索莉亚才是这三位血腥魔女中最可怕、最强大的那位，是她促成了致命饥渴教派与狂风阴谋团之间的联盟……但出于某种原因，她最近一直都没有露面。”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: 「裂け目は「宿命の渇き」教団の支配地であり、教団はタザーラ、キーケロス、シニストリアの3人のサキュバスが率いています。キーケロスは主にアリーナでの戦いを管轄していて、タザーラは新たな戦士を収穫するために各地を略奪している。しかし、3人のなかでもっとも恐ろしく手強いのがシニストリアです。教団と略奪の嵐の同盟を築いたのも彼女ですが…なぜか最近はあまり表に出てきませんね」
languages.original_text: "The Chasm is the turf of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst, which is led by three Succubi: Tazarra, Keykeross, and Sinisthoria. Keykeross is typically the one in charge of arena fights while Tazarra goes on raids to harvest new fighters. But it's no secret that Sinisthoria is the most fearsome and powerful of the three. She's the one who forged the alliance between the Cult and the Reaving Tempest... though for some reason, she has been avoiding the spotlight lately."

traits.locale_text: 「裂け目は「宿命の渇き」教団の支配地であり、教団はタザーラ、キーケロス、シニストリアの3人のサキュバスが率いています。キーケロスは主にアリーナでの戦いを管轄していて、タザーラは新たな戦士を収穫するために各地を略奪している。しかし、3人のなかでもっとも恐ろしく手強いのがシニストリアです。教団と略奪の嵐の同盟を築いたのも彼女ですが…なぜか最近はあまり表に出てきませんね」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: «El Abismo es el territorio del Culto de la Sed Letal, liderado por tres súcubos: Tazarra, Keykeross y Sinisthoria. Keykeross suele estar a cargo de los combates de la arena mientras que Tazarra sale de incursión en busca de nuevos guerreros, pero no es ningún secreto que la más poderosa y terrible de las tres es Sinisthoria. Fue ella quien forjó la alianza entre su Culto y la Tempestad Asoladora... aunque, por algún motivo, ha estado evitando mostrarse en público últimamente».
languages.original_text: "The Chasm is the turf of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst, which is led by three Succubi: Tazarra, Keykeross, and Sinisthoria. Keykeross is typically the one in charge of arena fights while Tazarra goes on raids to harvest new fighters. But it's no secret that Sinisthoria is the most fearsome and powerful of the three. She's the one who forged the alliance between the Cult and the Reaving Tempest... though for some reason, she has been avoiding the spotlight lately."

traits.locale_text: «El Abismo es el territorio del Culto de la Sed Letal, liderado por tres súcubos: Tazarra, Keykeross y Sinisthoria. Keykeross suele estar a cargo de los combates de la arena mientras que Tazarra sale de incursión en busca de nuevos guerreros, pero no es ningún secreto que la más poderosa y terrible de las tres es Sinisthoria. Fue ella quien forjó la alianza entre su Culto y la Tempestad Asoladora... aunque, por algún motivo, ha estado evitando mostrarse en público últimamente».

languages.original_text: "The Chasm is the turf of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst, which is led by three Succubi: Tazarra, Keykeross, and Sinisthoria. Keykeross is typically the one in charge of arena fights while Tazarra goes on raids to harvest new fighters. But it's no secret that Sinisthoria is the most fearsome and powerful of the three. She's the one who forged the alliance between the Cult and the Reaving Tempest... though for some reason, she has been avoiding the spotlight lately."

languages.text: « L'Abîme est le territoire du Culte de la Soif Fatale, qui est dirigé par trois succubes : Tazarra, Keykeross et Sinisthoria. Keykeross s'occupe des combats dans l'arène, tandis que Tazarra mène les raids visant à capturer de nouveaux combattants. Mais la plus redoutable et la plus puissante des trois, c'est Sinisthoria. C'est grâce à elle que le culte a pu nouer une alliance avec la Tempête ravageuse. Cela dit, elle se fait plutôt discrète ces derniers temps, pour une raison que j'ignore. »
languages.original_text: "The Chasm is the turf of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst, which is led by three Succubi: Tazarra, Keykeross, and Sinisthoria. Keykeross is typically the one in charge of arena fights while Tazarra goes on raids to harvest new fighters. But it's no secret that Sinisthoria is the most fearsome and powerful of the three. She's the one who forged the alliance between the Cult and the Reaving Tempest... though for some reason, she has been avoiding the spotlight lately."

traits.locale_text: « L'Abîme est le territoire du Culte de la Soif Fatale, qui est dirigé par trois succubes : Tazarra, Keykeross et Sinisthoria. Keykeross s'occupe des combats dans l'arène, tandis que Tazarra mène les raids visant à capturer de nouveaux combattants. Mais la plus redoutable et la plus puissante des trois, c'est Sinisthoria. C'est grâce à elle que le culte a pu nouer une alliance avec la Tempête ravageuse. Cela dit, elle se fait plutôt discrète ces derniers temps, pour une raison que j'ignore. »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Die Kluft ist das Gebiet des Kults des Fatalen Dursts, der von drei Sukkubi geleitet wird: Tazarra, Keykeross und Sinisthoria. Keykeross kümmert sich üblicherweise um die Arenakämpfe, während Tazarra bei Raubzügen neue Kämpfer beschafft. Es ist kein Geheimnis, dass Sinisthoria die Furchterregendste und Mächtigste der drei ist. Sie hat auch die Allianz zwischen dem Kult und dem Plündernden Sturm geschmiedet ... allerdings meidet sie in letzter Zeit aus irgendeinem Grund die Öffentlichkeit."
languages.original_text: "The Chasm is the turf of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst, which is led by three Succubi: Tazarra, Keykeross, and Sinisthoria. Keykeross is typically the one in charge of arena fights while Tazarra goes on raids to harvest new fighters. But it's no secret that Sinisthoria is the most fearsome and powerful of the three. She's the one who forged the alliance between the Cult and the Reaving Tempest... though for some reason, she has been avoiding the spotlight lately."

traits.locale_text: "Die Kluft ist das Gebiet des Kults des Fatalen Dursts, der von drei Sukkubi geleitet wird: Tazarra, Keykeross und Sinisthoria. Keykeross kümmert sich üblicherweise um die Arenakämpfe, während Tazarra bei Raubzügen neue Kämpfer beschafft. Es ist kein Geheimnis, dass Sinisthoria die Furchterregendste und Mächtigste der drei ist. Sie hat auch die Allianz zwischen dem Kult und dem Plündernden Sturm geschmiedet ... allerdings meidet sie in letzter Zeit aus irgendeinem Grund die Öffentlichkeit."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: "Yarık, Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı'nın çöplüğüdür. Burayı üç Sakkubus yönetiyor: Tazarra, Keykeross ve Sinisthoria. Keykeross, genel olarak arena dövüşlerinden sorumludur. Tazarraise yeni dövüşçüler toplamak için baskınlara gider. Ancak üçünün arasında en korkutucu ve güçlüsünün Sinisthoria olduğu herkesçe bilinir. Tarikat ve Müfteris Kasırga arasındaki ittifakı ayarlayan da oydu. Fakat nedense bir süredir göz önünde olmaktan kaçınıyor."
languages.original_text: "The Chasm is the turf of the Cult of the Fatal Thirst, which is led by three Succubi: Tazarra, Keykeross, and Sinisthoria. Keykeross is typically the one in charge of arena fights while Tazarra goes on raids to harvest new fighters. But it's no secret that Sinisthoria is the most fearsome and powerful of the three. She's the one who forged the alliance between the Cult and the Reaving Tempest... though for some reason, she has been avoiding the spotlight lately."

traits.locale_text: "Yarık, Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı'nın çöplüğüdür. Burayı üç Sakkubus yönetiyor: Tazarra, Keykeross ve Sinisthoria. Keykeross genel olarak arena dövüşlerinden sorumluyken, Tazarra yeni dövüşçüler toplamak için baskınlara gider. Ancak üçünün arasında en korkutucu ve güçlüsünün Sinisthoria olduğu da bir sır değil. Tarikat ve Müfteris Kasırga arasındaki ittifakı ayarlayan oydu. Bir süredir göz önünde olmaktan kaçınıyor ama nedense."
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
